**Instructions**

1. Highlight a row in the table. 
2. Edit:
    + Click "Delete" to delete a measurement. If "Fix Last Year" is selected the last year of growth will stay the same. 
    + Click "Insert" and enter a value to add a measurement. The new row appears above the highlight. If "Fix Last Year" is selected the last year of growth will stay the same.
3. Click "Save" to write the edited series or "Revert" to undo your edits.
